response.overview: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.
response.tagline: Someone has taken their love of scary movies one step too far. Solving this mystery is going to be murder.
response.title: Scream
